sentence.Network_en: This is an advertising agency with all its jugglery of public sentiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是一家耍花样竭力投合公众心理的广告代理商.

sentence.Network_en: No party could survive such a record of political trickery and financial jugglery.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有哪一个政党,耍弄这样的政治阴谋和经济欺骗后还可以存在下去的.

sentence.Network_en: The senator's tax program was mere jugglery.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位参议员提出的税收计划纯粹是在玩花招.

means.word_mean: 1. artful trickery designed to achieve an end;
